basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Beverley Cox Endowed Scholarship for Biology

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science pursuing a degree in the Department of Biology. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Majoring in Biology Demonstrate an outstanding academic record (including GPA, university service activities, and student scholarly activities) Must be completing 75 hours of credit towards degree Two faculty recommendations Selection Requirements Preference will be given to current active military or a military veteran with an interest in the healthcare profession

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
